text.p: Close of play scores on the second day of the Supersport series cricket matches on Saturday.
In Bloemfontein: Free State 251 and 115-4 (Deon Jordaan 66). Transvaal 197 (Nic Pothas 100).
In Kimberley: Griqualand West 298 (Martyn Gidley 117, Cedric English 51, Craig Matthews 4-32). Western Province 312-4 (John Commins 104 not out, Desmond Haynes 91).
In East London: Border 331 (Steven Pope 103, Pieter Strydom 100, Henry Williams 4-74). Boland 194-4 (Wayne Truter 80 not out).
In Port Elizabeth: Eastern Province 265 (Kepler Wessels 61, Derek Crookes 4-62). Natal 278-2 (Errol Stewart 125 not out, Jonty Rhodes 92 not out).
